text: I'm also adding code to my nightly mail-sending app to limit the rate at which we send emails. Right now we just send them out the pipe as fast as we can. Since computers these days are very fast, that's a lot of emails in a very short time. The new code, which I have yet to test (I will now) sends mail at most ten messages per second. It's possible that's the rate limit we exceeded. A lot of times this software stuff is like boxing with an invisible opponent. A very unreasonable opponent. :boom:
